# Xibaipo; A village about 90 km from [[w:Shijiazhuang|Shijiazhuang]], [[w:Hebei|Hebei]] province. It was the location of the [[w:Central Committee of the Communist Party of China|Central Committee of the Communist Party of China]] and the headquarters of the [[w:People's Liberation Army|People's Liberation Army]] during the decisive stages of the [[w:Chinese Civil War|Chinese Civil War]] between May 26, 1948 and March 23, 1949, at which point they were moved to Beijing. Today, the area houses a memorial site.
